Title: Proud Mary
Writer: John Stuart Newman (story by), Christian Swegal (story by), John Stuart Newman (screenplay by), Christian Swegal (screenplay by), Steve Antin (screenplay by)
Actors: Taraji P. Henson, Billy Brown, Jahi Di'Allo Winston, Neal McDonough
Plot: Mary (Taraji P. Henson) is a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.
